channel.title: Golang on Uncle Xiang's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Uncle Xiang's Notebook

item.title: Why learn a new language?
item.description:
Why learn other programming languages after having used C++ for over ten years, starting from my school days?

Work Experience: Lacks experience in elegant module design, C++ syntax is flexible, and learning other languages can help guide the creation of more elegant designs

I often find myself using these tools when writing them

Whether it’s the design of the underlying libraries or the implementation of business modules, the design principles are consistent
